channel.title: Pi my list
channel.description:
I'd appreciate it if you could help itleast one of them problems. more thez maryer.
Project insaninty 317
1. How to add a starter.
2. Making there a 15 time limit thing from trading/droping on new players.
3. I changed smite into soul split. but all it does it smiter. how do i make it heal 1/5 with a gfx.
4.Skillcapes. you can wear at 1 attk for an attk thing.. I needd this to be explained to me very well please.
5.There are no drops. they are disabled or something. mtv v2 version any fixes yet?
6. You can x-log during fights. ( how can i make it so if u x-log your characters stays till it dies then logs out)
7.running looks very messy/laggy.
8. All npcs face south. It's very annoying how can i make it face any position?
9.Sometimes the pm doesnt get sent to the other person? any fixes?

item.title: Pi my list
item.dc:creator: @chri55w chri55w
item.description:
@chri55w wrote:

while thats correct, that wont work for mtp v2, the drops on that server are disabled, im not sure how to re enable them, try checking the methods for drops might be able to find it, i couldnt find it when i had the source lol

good luck

  1. google this “PI how to stop new players trading” first link

  2. search in npchandler for

replace that with

[code] if (npcs[i].walkingType >= 0) {
switch(npcs[i].walkingType) {

					case 5:
						npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX-1, npcs[i].absY);
						break;

					case 4:
						npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX+1, npcs[i].absY);
						break;

					case 3:
						npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY-1);
						break;
					case 2:
						npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY+1);
						break;

					default:
						if (npcs[i].walkingType >= 0) {
							npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY); //makes it when npcs move they dont turn back to one direction
						}
						break;
					}
				}[/code]

to change direction go to spawn config file and the layout is now like this

the “5” defines the direction
Directions

1-Walk, 2-North, 3-South, 4-East, 5-West

Read full topic

item.title: Pi my list
item.dc:creator: @bedhead_321 bedhead 321
item.description:
@bedhead_321 wrote:

Your Drops should all be under
Data/cfg/NPCDrops.TSM

#Corporeal Beast
5247:30 4113:1 4111:1 995:1000000 452:20 405:1 2362:351 384:70 1754:100 1514:75 890:750 9144:250 1381:1 175:1 1149:1 391:10

5247 refers to my npc id
30 refers to rate (basically how many kills per rare drop)
the 1st row is all non rare drops that will be picked at random
2nd row is rare drops picked based on the number after my NPC id

Read full topic

item.title: Pi my list
item.dc:creator: @bedhead_321 bedhead 321
item.description:
@bedhead_321 wrote:

well, you know what ill help you out.

Your starter should be listed in Player Assistant.Java
should be located src/server/models/players

search for: Public Void addstarter(){
then follow my model below to add in your starter

Public Void addstarter(){
c.getItems().addItem(995,10000000);
c.getItems().addItem(6570,1);
c.getItems().addItem(7061,250);
c.getItems().addItem(1725,1);
c.getItems().addItem(1704,1);
c.getItems().addItem(7458,1);
c.getItems().addItem(3105,1);
c.getItems().addItem(1333,1);
c.getItems().addItem(1323,1);
c.getItems().addItem(3842,1);
